source.Select: SELECT DEPTID, MANAGER_ID, SEQ_NO SEQ, 0 FLAG,'AddCoHead2Org' UUSER,to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') UDATE FROM SYSADM.PS_Z_COH_WZSERS_VW
source.Insert: INSERT INTO EMP_ORG_COHEAD (DEPTID, MANAGER_ID, SEQ,FLAG,UUSER,UDATE) VALUES(:DEPTID, :MANAGER_ID, :SEQ,:FLAG,:UUSER,to_date(:UDATE,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'))
source.Update: UPDATE EMP_ORG_COHEAD SET SEQ=:SEQ,FLAG=:FLAG,UUSER=:UUSER,UDATE=to_date(:UDATE,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID AND MANAGER_ID=:MANAGER_ID
source.Check: SELECT DEPTID FROM EMP_ORG_COHEAD WHERE DEPTID=:DEPTID AND MANAGER_ID=:MANAGER_ID
